channel.title: ~~~major help!~~~ noob on server help!
channel.description:
ok heres the deal.
this nub gets on my server. claims hes the owner. and i ip ban him. he comes back and starts syi;ing the server.
i have an anti syi, but he made his own bot.
i gave him co owner so he would stop but hes being a major dick to everyone. please help!
how can i ban like him. this is his ip logs. 3 ip changes. help plz
bas3-kingston08-1168069379.dsl.bell.ca bas3-kingston08-1168069379.dsl.bell.ca
i added dsl.bell.ca on ipbanned list to hope he won't loggon and his internet provider is banned. but nope. im so clueless. HELP PLZ!
